about_the_game:
Gorgeous original brick-breaking game with tons of new fun bricks and amazing power-ups never seen before!

In your quest of recapturing the Fairy Treasure, you will travel along the Fairy River from castle to cave in level after level of fast arcade fun and gorgeous sceneries.

Gather magic scroll parts to find hidden treasures, solve puzzles to unlock secret areas and collect keys to unleash the mighty chain ball.

Fairy Treasure features tons of challenging levels of block-breaking fun in an astounding world of fantasy and magic. May the fairies be with you!

Fairy Treasure features:
✔ Magic fairy tale theme with a compelling story
✔ Tons of levels of brick-breaking fun
✔ 112 different bricks and enemies
✔ 14 power-ups and magic potions
✔ Gorgeous theme inspired graphics and music
✔ Realistic game physics
✔ Accurate controls and super smooth gameplay
✔ 21 challenging achievements
✔ Three difficulty levels to master
✔ Global high scores let you compete against players from around the world
✔ Excellent replay value
✔ and much much more...

If you like breakout and arkanoid-style games you will definitely love this highly innovative brick breaker game!

Game On! :)

Game On! :)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 32 MB of video memory
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 32 MB of video memory
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Fairy Treasure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 32 MB of video memory
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with at least 32 MB of video memory
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
